#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, n, m, k, i, j, cnt;
    string s;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        cin >> n >> m >> k;
        priority_queue <int, vector <int>, greater <int> > pq;
        for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            cin >> s;
            cnt = 0;
            for (j = 0; j < m; ++j)
                cnt += (s[j] == '*');
            pq.push(cnt);
        }
        while (k--) {
            cnt = pq.top();
            pq.pop();
            pq.push(m-cnt);
        }
        cnt = 0;
        while (!pq.empty()) {
            cnt += pq.top();
            pq.pop();
        }
        cout << cnt << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
